channel.title: CVE Feed for ExtendThemes -- Kubio AI Page Builder
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ExtendThemes -- Kubio AI Page Builder

item.title: CVE-2024-39661|2024-08-01T21:41:30.467Z -- extendthemes -- kubio%20ai%20page%20builder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ExtendThemes Kubio AI Page Builder.This issue affects Kubio AI Page Builder: from n/a through 2.2.4.
